title: Hello after android 11 update my camera and flash light stop working on Pixel 3
content: Google why you are not fixing this software issue. It is really shame for such a big corporation not to fix this issue. I have tried everything but it didn't work. Google why you are so lazy, thousands  of users have this problem and you don't care. It is a shame shame shame I will never buy your phone again. I will tell to all my friends about your unrespectful behavior to your users.
